description:
A group chat team that have participants takes turn to publish a message
    to all, using a ChatCompletion model to select the next speaker after each message.
label: SelectorGroupChat

participants.description: An agent that provides assistance with tool use.
participants.label: AssistantAgent

config.name: AssistantAgent

model_client.description: Chat completion client for OpenAI hosted models.
model_client.label: OpenAIChatCompletionClient

tools.description: Create custom tools by wrapping standard Python functions.
tools.label: FunctionTool

config.source_code:
async def generate_md(content:str, file_name:str):
    """
    Asynchronously generates a markdown file with the given content.
    Args:
        content (str): The content to be written to the markdown file.
        file_name (str): The name of the markdown file to be created.
    Writes:
        A markdown file at the specified file path containing the provided content.
    """
    with open(file_name, "w") as f:
        f.write(content)
config.name: generate_md
config.description: A tool that generates a markdown file from an input string.

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.
model_context.label: UnboundedChatCompletionContext

config.description: Utilize surfer agent to research and generate a report based on a given topic
config.system_message: You are a helpful assistant. Your task is to research and synthesize data extracted into a high quality literature review including CORRECT references. You MUST write a final report that is formatted as a literature review with CORRECT references.  Your response should end with the word 'TERMINATE'

participants.description: MultimodalWebSurfer is a multimodal agent that acts as a web surfer that can search the web and visit web pages.
participants.label: MultimodalWebSurfer

config.name: WebSurfer

model_client.description: Chat completion client for OpenAI hosted models.
model_client.label: OpenAIChatCompletionClient

config.description:
A helpful assistant with access to a web browser.
    Ask them to perform web searches, open pages, and interact with content (e.g., clicking links, scrolling the viewport, filling in form fields, etc.).
    It can also summarize the entire page, or answer questions based on the content of the page.
    It can also be asked to sleep and wait for pages to load, in cases where the page seems not yet fully loaded.

model_client.description: Chat completion client for OpenAI hosted models.
model_client.label: OpenAIChatCompletionClient

termination_condition.description: Terminate the conversation if a specific text is mentioned.
termination_condition.label: TextMentionTermination

config.selector_prompt:
You are in a role play game. The following roles are available:
{roles}.
Read the following conversation. Then select the next role from {participants} to play. Only return the role.

{history}

Read the above conversation. Then select the next role from {participants} to play. Only return the role.
